title: (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2023 (S.I. No. 252 of 2023), and
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Circular Economy and Miscellaneous
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Circular Economy and Miscellaneous 

Provisions Act 2022 (Commencement of Certain Provisions) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited circular economy miscellaneous provision act 2022 (commencement certain provisions) order 2024

title: (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2023 (S.I. No. 252 of 2023), and
heading: 2. The 15th day of February 2024 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 15th day of February 2024 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Circular Economy and Miscellaneous Provisions 
Act 2022 (No. 26 of 2022) shall come into operation: 

(a) 

sections 20 and 21; 

(b) 

section 23; 

(c) 

section 32; 

(d) 

sections 34. 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 9 February 2024 

OSSIAN SMYTH, 
 Minister of State at the Department of the Environment, Climate and 

Communications 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 16th February, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [40] 3
